summary: This memorandum summarizes Cuban operations from September 1-15, 1961, detailing FI-CI activity, propaganda efforts (including Operations Bolivar and Virgen del Cobre), political action related to the Cuban Revolutionary Council (CRC), paramilitary activities, training, communications, and support. It includes information on agent activities, broadcasts, leaflet distribution, periodical publications, tours, and financial obligations.
title: Report on Cuban Operations for Period 1-15 September 61
sender: J. C. KING, Chief, Western Hemisphere Division
